attributes.action: Ignore the petition to abolish private and grammar schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This country needs grammar and private schools. Students who are achieving far higher results than their fellow students in state schools should be allowed to excel in learning while those who are achieving less can therefore be focused at by teaching in the state schools to improve their learning in tandum.
State schools are often not good at identifying or supporting students with learning difficulties, such as Dyslexia and Dysfractia while the private system again excels and supports such students so they can reach their potential.
The private school system also provides 1000s of jobs in the country, aswell as supporting the state and grammar system, as parents are already paying for their children to goto a state school, yet choose to send them to private school.
